name: BOMB BUG!
description:
For the theme of Joined Together we decided we wanted to take two game mechanics not often combined and couple them together. We decided to join cooking-grenades with blocking-damage and ran with it as far as we could.

Space - Molt exoskeleton (Cook grenade)
Arrow-Keys - Movement and choosing which direction to launch your exoskeleton
R - Restart level

All art and sound assets created for the jam by Misc
All Unity C# scripts (except camera controller) were created for the jam by Michael
